name: cromulent
text: Does Ray have the nerve to touch that apple?

name: aperson
text: Ray is showing you the apple. It's a symbol of the journey that he will take you on should you listen to his music.

name: abe
text: He has no choice. It is... destiny.

name: cailetshadow
text: This is hardcore religious metaphor, as befits the storyline. Ray has already taken the forbidden fruit; now he invites you to share it and share in his SIN.

name: saint
text: the apple is your destiny, Ray. wear the wig...touch the apple.

name: mortshire
text: go on, have a taste.

name: cryptfiend85
text: are you a bad enough dude to touch the apple

name: red_rooster
text:
"Don't wear a cape!"
that's one of my favorite Ray quotes.
